name: AzureAppSericePlanProvision
description: Create or Update an Azure App Service Plan
author: InCycleSoftwareInc-DEV

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Release Manager Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager Subscription to target deplpoyment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Azyre Resource Group for deployment.

inputs.name: AppServicePlanName
inputs.label: Application Service Plan Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Azure App Service Plan to create or update

inputs.name: AppServicePlanTier
inputs.label: Application Service Plan Tier
inputs.helpMarkDown: Performance & Scalaning Tier for the App Service Plan

inputs.name: AppServicePlanInstanceCapacity
inputs.label: Application Service Plan Host Instances
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of the Azure App Service Plan Host Instances to start with
